name: B. Raspberries
statement:
You are given an array of integers a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n and a number k (2
leq k
leq 5). In one operation, you can do the following: Choose an index 1
leq i
leq n, Set a_i = a_i + 1.Find the minimum number of operations needed to
make the product of all the numbers in the array a_1
cdot a_2
cdot
ldots
cdot a_n divisible by k.
